code: export var getProductInBasketTex=function getProductInBasketTex(atlas){var productTex=[{image:atlas.findRegion("lo_1_gio",-1),type:0},{image:atlas.findRegion("lo_2_gio",-1),type:0},{image:atlas.findRegion("hop_thuoc_gio",-1),type:1}];return productTex;};export var getProductTexture=function getProductTexture(atlas){var productTex=[{image:atlas.findRegion("lo_thuoc",-1),type:0},{image:atlas.findRegion("hop_thuoc",-1),type:1},{image:atlas.findRegion("vitaminA",-1),type:2}];return productTex;};export var getFakeProductTex=function getFakeProductTex(atlas){var productTex=[{image:atlas.findRegion("lo_thuoc_fake",-1),type:0},{image:atlas.findRegion("lo_thuoc_fake2",-1),type:1},{image:atlas.findRegion("hop_thuoc_fake",-1),type:2},{image:atlas.findRegion("hop_thuoc_fake2",-1),type:3}];return productTex;};
